price: 21. Zij zijn degenen die zichzelf verloren hebben, en hun valse goden, die zij bedacht hebben, zullen van hen verdwijnen.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna khasirū anfusahum waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
